title: Straight serif used by Saffron Consultants
author: Quadrato

comments.content:
I think this is [Guardian Text Egyptian](http://web.archive.org/web/20140701103639/http:/www.christianschwartz.com/gdntegyp.shtml) from Christian Schwartz. It was proprietary for the Manchester Guardian, but is now available for licensing.

- Mike Yanega

Here is the link for Commercial type where you can test drive [Guardian Egyptian Text](http://web.archive.org/web/20140701103639/http:/typophile.com/wiki/https%3A/%252Fcommercialtype.com/typefaces/guardian/egyptian_text) and license it.

- Mike Yanega
